Text: P.S. In addition to the French language audio there is a dubbed english option. I would recommend watching this in the original language with the subtitles (even though the DVD defaults to the dubbed option) but hey, I'm a purist.
i so want this, but i wish it wasn't compressed so much. movie-only would have been preferable. thanks

Iso quality is pretty good. I did do a couple of test burns before I posted the finalised iso and the version I uploaded came out the best. Can't please everyone. Maybe I'll do the full uncompressed DVD later when I've got the bandwidth.

thanks!
As I'm studying French now, I'd really love to see this in full (I saw some parts of it, and really loved it)
I only wish there were French subs as well (for my studying purposes), but this will do, really :)
i m a fan of Mark Dacascos and i have been looking for the dvd version fo this movie for a long time. thanks man!!!
Awesome, I real version. generally don't bother with full rips, but this one's worth it for the non-subbed version. Thanks.
